section.title: Performing SmartState Analysis on Datastores
section.para: Analyze a datastore to collect information on the types of files on a datastore, and to see the number of managed/registered, managed/unregistered, and unmanaged virtual machines. To perform a SmartState analysis, the datastore is accessible from a running host and valid security credentials are supplied for that host.

note.para: Be aware that executing a SmartState Analysis on a datastore from the console takes a while to return data on the content. If Capacity and Utilization roles are enabled, CloudForms Management Engine performs the analysis automatically on a scheduled basis approximately every 24 hours.

step.para: Click OK to confirm the analysis of the Datastores.
